dimensions.label: Personality Tone
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin present themselves in online interactions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will radiate positivity and enthusiasm, inspiring others with their energy.
Your FarTwin will approach conversations with a thoughtful and introspective tone, sharing personal insights and experiences.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Interest Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their interests and passions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically share their love for various topics, inspiring others with their excitement.
Your FarTwin will approach new subjects with a measured tone, carefully considering the implications before sharing their thoughts.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate uncertainty and take calculated risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly seize opportunities for growth, exploring uncharted territories with confidence.
Your FarTwin will exercise caution when faced with uncertainty, carefully weighing pros and cons before making decisions.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning new skills and knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will delve deeply into topics, thoroughly understanding the nuances before applying their knowledge.
Your FarTwin will focus on hands-on experience, rapidly acquiring skills through trial and error.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express and manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly share their feelings, seeking support and connection from others.
Your FarTwin will maintain emotional equilibrium, adapting to challenges with poise and composure.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will concentrate on a single task, methodically breaking down complexities into manageable steps.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, prioritizing tasks based on urgency and importance.

dimensions.label: Feedback Reception
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin receive and incorporate feedback from others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically consider alternative perspectives, integrating feedback into their growth.
Your FarTwin will cautiously receive feedback, carefully weighing the source and intent before adjusting their approach.
